item.Q:
Write the character:
to save; to assist; to rescue
item.A:
救 (strokes unavailable)
jiù
挽救 wǎnjiù to save; to remedy; to rescue

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to fall; to collapse; to topple; to change (trains or buses); to fail; bankrupt
2: upset; turn over; to tip; to pour; to go home; to the contrary; inverted
item.A:
1: dǎo 2: dào
打倒 dǎdǎo flatten 倒是 dàoshi contrary to what one might expect; actually; contrariwise

item.Q:
Write the character:
parent; one's own (flesh and blood); relative; related; marriage; bride; close; intimate; in person; first-hand; in favor of; pro-; to kiss
item.A:
traditional: 親
qīn
母亲 (母親) mǔqīn mother (formal)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to do harm to; to cause trouble to; harm; evil; calamity
item.A:
hài
危害 wēihài to jeopardize; to harm; to endanger

traditional: 亂
luàn
混乱 (混亂) hùnluàn confusion; chaos

item.Q:
Write the character:
ancient; old; palaeo-; surname Gu
item.A:
gǔ
古代 gǔdài ancient times; olden times

item.Q:
Write the character:
a step; a pace; walk; march; stages in a process
item.A:
bù
进步 (進步) jìnbù progress

item.Q:
Write the character:
a jewel or gem; a treasure; precious
item.A:
traditional: 寶
bǎo
宝贵 (寶貴) bǎoguì valuable; precious; value; treasure; set store by

item.Q:
Write the character:
to hit; to strike; to break
item.A:
traditional: 擊
jī
打击 (打擊) dǎjī to hit; to strike; to attack

item.Q:
Write the character:
to lift; to hold up; to cite; to enumerate; to act; to raise; to choose; to elect
item.A:
举 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 舉
jǔ
举行 (舉行) jǔxíng to hold (a meeting, ceremony etc)

终 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 終
zhōng
始终 (始終) shǐzhōng from beginning to end; all along

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: (nonverbal grunt as interjection); OK, yeah; what?
2: (a groaning sound)
item.A:
嗯 (strokes unavailable)
1: èn 2: ēn

item.Q:
Write the character:
stamp; seal; mark; print; abbr. for India; surname Yin
item.A:
yìn
印度 Yìndù India

限 (strokes unavailable)
xiàn
限制 xiànzhì (impose) restrictions; to limit; to bound; to restrict

item.Q:
Write the character:
according to; depend on; near to
item.A:
依 (strokes unavailable)
yī
依靠 yīkào to rely on sth (for support etc); to depend on

item.Q:
Write the character:
absolutely; decidedly (in negative constructions); break; to judge
item.A:
断 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 斷
duàn
不断 (不斷) bùduàn unceasing; uninterrupted; continuous; constant

item.Q:
Write the character:
light; easy; gentle; soft; reckless; unimportant; frivolous; small in number; unstressed; neutral
item.A:
traditional: 輕
qīng
减轻 (減輕) jiǎnqīng to lighten; to ease; to alleviate
